p: For the treatment of DU intoxication, scholars mainly focused on DU decorporation in the body using synthetic chelating agents, and a series of agents have been developed 9 10 11 12 13. However, there are few drugs with low toxicity that are highly effective in promoting the excretion of DU. Catechol-3,6-bis(methyleiminodiacetic acid) (CBMIDA) has been shown to reduce uranium burden without causing renal damage, but it also has low gastrointestinal absorption and the effect related to pH 14.
